snippet: David Wildstein, a former Port Authority official, says there is evidence to prove the New Jersey governor knew about the lane closings at the George Washington Bridge, which the governor has denied.
abstract: Former Port Authority official David Wildstein says there is evidence that New Jersey Gov Chris Christie knew about controversial lane closings at the George Washington Bridge as they occurred; Wildstein directly contradicts Christie's statements at news conference, marking a striking break between previous allies.

byline.contributor: Thomas Kaplan, William K. Rashbaum and Ashley Southall contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: David Wildstein, a former Port Authority official, says there is evidence to prove the New Jersey governor knew about the lane closings at the George Washington Bridge, which the governor has denied.

headline.main: Christie Linked to Knowledge of Shut Lanes
headline.print_headline: Christie Linked to Knowledge of Shut Lanes
